data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Kunar, Afghanistan humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kunar, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Kunar. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Kunar, Afghanistan.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 89 believers in the state of Kunar.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Kunar.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Punjabi, Western people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Kunar, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 562,293 who are far from you in Kunar, Afghanistan from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Kunar, Afghanistan to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.
